basic.Target Organism: [Ref.16945333]Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis (KCTC 3068) (MIC=2.0 μM), Staphylococcus aureus (KCTC 1621) (MIC=2.0 μM), Staphylococcus epidermidis (KCTC 1917) (MIC=1.0 μM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (KCTC 1682) (MIC=2.0 μM), Salmonella typhimurium (KCTC 1926) (MIC=1.0 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (KCTC 1637) (MIC=2.0 μM);Antibiotic-resistant bacteria:MRSA 1 (CCARM 3001) (MIC=2.0 μM), MRSA 2 (CCARM 3089) (MIC=2.0 μM), MRSA 3 (CCARM 3543) (MIC=1.0 μM), MDRPA 1 (CCARM 2092) (MIC=8.0 μM), MDRPA 2 (CCARM 2095) (MIC=8.0 μM), MDRPA 3 (CCARM 2109) (MIC=8.0 μM).
